job_title: Project Manager in Huntington Beach, CA
pros: This company encourages interns to receive certifications and pushes people to find what they love to do and follow it! If you are familiar with social media there is a place here for you. If you love writing blogs and recipes, you will have so much fun working for this company. They do nothing but encourage and love on the interns and they are very appreciative of the work that you put in. I would highly recommend this place to anybody who needs experience and wants to learn various platforms.
cons: I have nothing bad to say about this company, honestly.
